Career Profile

I am a meteorological data scientist and engineer with a focus on building award-winning computing environments for creating, processing, and analyzing weather data. Using my deep understanding of numerical weather predicition (NWP) and weather datasets, I continue innovate by delivering weather-focused insights using cost-effective and low latency solutions. I am a AWS Certified Solutions Architect - Associate with robust knowledge of many services and their application for weather and climate workflows. Please find a PDF copy of my CV here.
